entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low.
